identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

theme.description: High contrast, bold black typography on white, with electric magenta accents. Serious but energetic.

headings.usage: All H1-H3 headings. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

primary.usage: Primary CTAs, Active States, Brand Accents

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). High contrast.
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-foreground border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

cards.style: Flat with subtle border. No massive shadows.
cards.classes: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border shadow-sm rounded-sm

inputs.classes: flex h-9 w-full rounded-sm border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.style: Pill shaped or squared, solid colors for status.

landing_page.description: Asymmetric layout. Large typography. High contrast sections.
landing_page.hero_section: Split screen or heavy typography left, image right (masked or framed).

dashboard.description: Dense data grid. Sidebar navigation. Clear hierarchy.
dashboard.task_table: Clean rows, distinct status badges, action menus.

images.description: Confident businesswoman with arms crossed. Use for Hero section to imply empowerment and control.
Diverse team working together on laptop. Use for 'Delegation' or 'Team' feature section.
Businessman in cafe working. Use for 'Freedom/Lifestyle' benefit or Analysis section.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Sharp joins if possible.

setup: Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette and font families.
Import fonts in index.css or index.html.
implementation_rules: Use 'DM Sans' for all body text.
Ensure the Primary Color (#E91E8C) is used for primary actions ONLY. Do not overuse.
Maintain strict Light Mode. Do not implement Dark Mode toggles unless requested.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard.
Ensure all text has high contrast (APCA compliant).
universal_guidelines: Micro-animations on all interactions (hover, focus, active).
No 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic gradients, rounded everything).
